#### Informations
Applications inside `standalone` folder are slower than the applications installed using `installer` inside __installer__ folder. Standalone app needs to unpack files before it execute which makes it slower than installer which has unpacked files, already

`standalone` folder has applications that can be run without having to install them

cli - console base application. _Open command prompt while executing_
no-cli - non console base application _Doesn't open command prompt while executing_
